# shoehorn_feature_flag (Resource)

Manages a Shoehorn feature flag.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Manage a feature flag
resource "shoehorn_feature_flag" "dark_mode" {
  key             = "enable-dark-mode"
  name            = "Dark Mode"
  description     = "Enable dark mode for the platform UI"
  default_enabled = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) The unique key for the feature flag.
- `name` (String) The display name of the feature flag.

### Optional

- `default_enabled` (Boolean) Whether the feature flag is enabled by default.
- `description` (String) A description of the feature flag.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the feature flag.
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp.
